txt.en:
'[placeholder], we know not for a certainty what the half-orcs seek at Barad Morlas, but we know that they have many evil wolves in their ranks. The foul beasts may lead them quickly to that which they seek.

'I think perhaps we should try to disrupt their efforts by slaying the half-orcs who keep watch over the wolves. Without their guidance the wolves may turn aside from their task.

'Go to Barad Morlas, south-west of here, and hunt the wolf-keepers. You must not fail!'
'You have done well, [placeholder], but I have another task for you, if you will hear me out....'
'If you defeat the wolf-keepers at Barad Morlas, it may help to throw the half-orcs' plans into disarray.'
The half-orcs at Barad Morlas are using evil wolves to scour the ruins.
Defeated half-orc wolf-keepers at Barad Morlas ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat half-orc wolf-keepers at Barad Morlas ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Half-orc wolf-keepers can be found patrolling Barad Morlas, south-west of Echad Eregion.\n\nDornhador has asked you to defeat the half-orc wolf-keepers at Barad Morlas to help throw their efforts into disarray.
Talk to Dornhador at Echad Eregion
Dornhador is at Echad Eregion, north-east of Barad Morlas.\n\nYou should return to Dornhador with news of your victory.
